title: Relates to crime of staging a motor vehicle accident
summary: Creates the crimes of staging a motor vehicle accident in the first, second and third degrees; prohibits acting as a passenger or an operator of a motor vehicle with intent to defraud; by means of planning and execution of an accident; provides crime is a class B felony if an uninvolved party is injured.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to staging a motor vehicle accident
